Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package multus is earlier than 4.0.2-3, affected by CVE-2023-45288
